keyMoments.title: Leopard Transformation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci reveals his Devil Fruit ability, transforming into a leopard-human hybrid using the Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Lucci's true power and establishes him as one of the most formidable opponents the Straw Hats have faced.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Luffy and Zoro
keyMoments.description: Using his leopard form and Rokushiki techniques, Lucci swiftly defeats both Luffy and Zoro, sending them into the sea.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power gap between CP9 and the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Uses Rankyaku to Bisect Mansion
keyMoments.description: Lucci uses Rankyaku with such power that it cuts the entire Galley-La headquarters in half.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Lucci's mastery of Rokushiki techniques with devastating destructive capability.

abilities.description: Transforms into a leopard-human hybrid, gaining enhanced strength, speed, claws, and fangs.
A powerful projectile technique that creates compressed air blades by kicking at high speeds, capable of cutting through buildings.

reveals.information: User of the Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard
Master of Rokushiki martial arts, specifically Rankyaku
Next target is Franky to obtain the Pluton blueprints

keyMoments.title: Shares His Story with Franky
keyMoments.description: Usopp opens up to Franky about his falling out with the Straw Hat crew over the Going Merry, moving Franky to tears.
keyMoments.significance: Crucial character moment showing Usopp processing his pain and beginning to form a bond with Franky.

keyMoments.title: Learns About the Klabautermann
keyMoments.description: Franky begins to explain the Klabautermann to Usopp, validating his experience of seeing a mysterious figure repair the Going Merry on Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Usopp's encounter was real and adds spiritual significance to the Going Merry's story.

relationships.description: Usopp shares his painful story with Franky, who responds with empathy and understanding, beginning their friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp tells Franky about his falling out with the crew, and Franky is moved to tears by the story.

reveals.information: Still processing the pain of leaving the Straw Hat crew over the Going Merry decision

keyMoments.title: Moved by Usopp's Story
keyMoments.description: Franky is moved to tears after hearing Usopp's story about the Going Merry and his separation from the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's emotional depth and deep understanding of the bond between ships and crews.

keyMoments.title: Shares Tom's Legacy
keyMoments.description: Franky tells Usopp about Tom, the legendary shipwright who built Gol D. Roger's ship and contributed to Water 7's development.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the flashback arc explaining Franky's past and the Pluton blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Explains the Klabautermann
keyMoments.description: Franky begins to explain the concept of the Klabautermann, the ship spirit that appears when a vessel is greatly loved.
keyMoments.significance: Validates Usopp's Skypiea experience and introduces maritime folklore to the story.

relationships.description: Franky forms a bond with Usopp after hearing his story and sharing wisdom about ships and their spirits.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky and Usopp connect over their love and understanding of ships, with Franky showing empathy for Usopp's situation.

relationships.description: Franky was Tom's second disciple and learned shipbuilding from the legendary shipwright.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky mentions Tom's contributions to Water 7 and his legacy.

reveals.information: Was Tom's second disciple and student
Knows about the Klabautermann and ship folklore
Has a soft heart and deep empathy despite tough exterior

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy is swiftly defeated by Rob Lucci in his leopard form and sent flying into the sea.
keyMoments.significance: One of Luffy's most complete defeats, showing he is not yet strong enough to face CP9's elite.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Zoro is swiftly defeated by Rob Lucci alongside Luffy and sent flying into the sea.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Zoro, one of the crew's strongest, cannot match CP9's power.

keyMoments.title: Thrown Out the Window by Lucci
keyMoments.description: Nami is knocked out by Rob Lucci and thrown out of the window of the burning Galley-La headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Completes the total defeat of all present Straw Hat members.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Buried Under Rubble
keyMoments.description: Chopper is buried under rubble inside the burning Galley-La headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Leaves the crew's doctor in a life-threatening situation.

keyMoments.title: Left to Die by CP9
keyMoments.description: CP9 ties up Paulie and leaves him in the burning Galley-La headquarters to die.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates CP9's ruthlessness and willingness to kill.

keyMoments.title: Left to Die by CP9
keyMoments.description: CP9 ties up Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7, and leaves him in the burning building to die after confirming he doesn't have the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the World Government's willingness to kill even a city's mayor to obtain ancient weapons.

reveals.information: Does not possess the Pluton blueprints
